title: Border Collie Haiku
description: A Border Collie tries his paw at haiku, and his human adds pictures to illustrate each poem. More than 30 poems with a point of view about four feet lower than the average human's. You'll enjoy getting inside the world's smartest dog's head.Angelo and his human live in an off grid home in the middle of a beautiful nowhere. You can follow his and The Man's adventures at www.hermitblog.com.
author: Angelo Dirks
